lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how they act or anything--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he's normal, he's normal, I don't know, like, how a real goth person--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me tell you, this was a dark mirror to stare into, this was a heavy mirror to stare into and I've got to reevaluate some things now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I've never seen you in your goth persona.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I don't know what you're like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've definitely seen whoever this is at a couple clubs that I then immediately left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your goth persona sounds like your surfer dude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Marisha stuttering) Yeah, they move, they're animated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I spent a good hour with these cards and my kids today, and my kids flipped out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you got this is now available, which is awesome, which are the spell cards, and for those who ever want to be really great DMs and ruin their world, there's the Deck of Many Animated Things, which actually has all the Deck of Many Things cards that are also animated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the classic Void card that gave us our one-shot, or two-shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The void is like my heart and soul.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm listening to Bauhaus right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So thank you guys for your support, and go check out the cool shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In case you guys missed it, our latest episode of Between the Sheets recently aired, hosted by our fantastic Brian W. Foster, featuring our friend for a long time, and one of the people responsible for this whole show and channel, Felicia Day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was there this past weekend in Stockholm, and it was amazing, I got to meet so many incredible-- you okay, Laura, you having a rough time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm getting all the ones out before--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I gotcha, I was like bad experience in Sweden?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no, sorry, I'm testing--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It has nothing to do with anybody besides herself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have an enormous programming schedule update coming next Wednesday, including brand new shows and a whole bunch of new Everything is Content specials, so keep an eye on that next Wednesday to have the announcements revealed before you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, an important housekeeping update, we will not have a regular episode of Critical Role on Thursday, October 3rd, because we have enough people out of town that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enough people out of town that we're just not going to be able to really do an episode properly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A one-of-a-kind one-shot will be in place that Thursday, GMed by our very own Sam Riegel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, there's a quick announcement you have as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (Matt laughing) Tonight is the final night for our Vex and Percy beautiful rings, yes, those rings, they'll be gone after tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, this is the last time you can order them period, this is it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need some more rings, so that would be good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there'll be no way of getting these rings after the fact?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think there will be, I think this is it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like this is it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay then, well then get your orders in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll find out and I'll let you guys know before the night is out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Thank you, Laura.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looks good on you, Taliesin, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome, I believe that's the last of our announcements, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we fork Sam's tongue before the game starts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to it in a second, yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No way to get them after this, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) Well, then you better get in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Mighty Nein, as you come to consciousness and gather yourselves, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you do this again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go downstairs and just like, eat all of the pastries, because we haven't had them in a long time, and these ones have cinnamon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take your, you know, magic bag with you, so you can load up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I scry in the morning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would the rest of you like to do, if anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I already use both of my 5th-levels? I scryed twice this morning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. One failed and one succeeded, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will go down into the common room to eat as well and wait for everyone to gather, because we need to decide-- good morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to decide what we are going to do after, you know, you spent any time with your mother?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she wasn't awake when I came downstairs yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) Probably should not stay too long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can go to Zadash, though, and see my dad, which will be cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to, are you going to discuss that with your mother? Or is that just for you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if, you know, I talk to him and he's like, "Oh yeah, I totally left her, I did it," and I don't want her to know that, so maybe I shouldn't tell her I'm going to see him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think there is an argument for that, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wonder if there is some way to, you know, definitively settle it, with him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, your mother thinks it's him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could draw her a picture of him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, what I was thinking could be really fun, don't tell anyone, I was thinking, when we get to Zadash, when we get to where he lives, I could make myself look like my mum! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, and then I could be like, "Oh my gosh, Babenon, I missed you so much," you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From maybe like five to 10 feet back, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just feel like, you know, every time that I talk to him, he's a little bit like, "Hmm, I don't know," because you know, he never met me in person or anything, so he doesn't know for sure that it's me, or that I exist, so he might think no, but if he sees my mama, he will definitely know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, there will be no mistaking his reaction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just you want to be careful the reaction you're going to get, but there's no way to know unless you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he's like, "Ooh, Marion, I really missed you," and he comes in like he's going to do something, I'll just snap myself back and then he'll know it's me and he won't do anything, you know, won't be weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who'll know it's you? Good morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it could be weird still, but, family--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What'll be fine? Ah, good morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to go see my dad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is your mom listening right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no insulation in this place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I did totally do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is movement, the shuffling about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you used to eavesdrop on people?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, did you go to doorways and put your ears to them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You see that little crevice up there? You can see it through the the two slots? Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, just on the other side of it is another hotel room, but if you're in there, you can hear everything that's happening in this room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get up and run up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the little crevice I used to hide in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's nobody in there at the moment, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all clear! And I come back down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, Jester, stay up there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (softer) Can you hear me now? (softer) Can you hear me now? (even softer) Can you hear this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can hear everything that you're saying because (mumbling) are the best.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) What about this? Can you hear this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I can tell you're-- (loudly) I can tell you're whispering!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you all yelling so much?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're just doing a little soundcheck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's in the crevice doing the soundcheck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come running out of the crevice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you know how long you'll be gone, "or will you be coming back anytime soon?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we'll pass through again, because we have Traveler Con coming up, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to come to it? You probably don't, but it would be really fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tell me more about it at some point."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's very excited, it seems to be like quite the crowd will be gathering for this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A volcano, yes? That's got to be advertised clearly on the pamphlets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, but don't worry, not in the dangerous part of it, just the cool part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there's already a plate set aside for her, part of the morning routine, and she takes it and heads back up the stairs with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she okay, does she seem okay? Am I getting vibes like she's upset or distressed, or a little stressed out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check, if you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She seems at the very least sad that it's such a short meeting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see you're all in rather good spirits this morning. Certainly the tale that Jester told last night was quite dire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we discussed at all how we plan to follow up on what she saw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hate to leave your mother so fast, although I worry about your people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I should probably check in on the Soul.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I know anybody there that we could send a message to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck is going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He put crushed ice in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, are you putting sand and gravel in your drinks now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought crushed ice would be a good idea, but it sounds like a bunch of rocks in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only takes in that which makes it stronger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After it chips his front teeth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not just Beau's compatriots, but also this is our first lock on where Yasha has been, period, since we saw her and that thing, I mean--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know why I thought she would be sticking more to like unpopulated areas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It seems like whatever they were looking for, they found.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, this could be a good thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is an incredible journey from where they were to Zadash, yes? We did it, yeah, with teleportation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right, you said that you saw them disappear at the end of your vision, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any way to trace a teleportation after it's been triggered?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If anyone could do it, it would be Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have I ever heard of such a thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no receipt that prints out, and it's like thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the first moment we've had for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to make our way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's going to take some time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So it's a place of knowledge, yes? Record-keeping, history, things like that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many of those are there in Wildemount?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's, I believe, just one here in Wildemount?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there's an archive in Rexxentrum, and there's one in Zadash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, in the capital, and then Zadash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there's one in Port Damali.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think they hit the other ones before they hit this one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we check in with Port Damali and see if they have been hit, and maybe that's where they're going next if they haven't?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if I know anyone in Port Damali.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It feels like, though-- It feels like they found what they were looking for, you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I don't know how many libraries they hit in between.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or they may have a teleportation circle to the other library, and if we say that we have information on what happened, maybe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true, they may be able to send us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure all the libraries have teleportation circles, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the most part, there is one in each facility that is used to anchor to each one and transition between, but it's not an open passageway. It's one that's utilized only for necessary travel of those that are generally pretty higher up or on specific missions for the archive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That means I've got access that I didn't have before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we trying to send some sort of a message to the Port Damali's Cobalt Soul?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think if we just get to Zadash, they'll already know and we can get word from them if the other reserves have been hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any sense to sending a message to the one in Port Damali and saying if you haven't suffered an attack, at least to increase your security?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If they don't know of the attack in Zadash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know of any expositors or archivists in Port Damali Cobalt Soul?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, unfortunately most of your studying was specifically within the Empire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We both would know people in Port Damali.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the people that were close to you, you have no idea where they are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, our best bet would be reaching out to someone like Twiggy and having her deliver the message.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think a message from Twiggy would be very trustworthy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think the monks at the Soul would look at her like she was either crazy or they'd laugh and say they already knew.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, to Zadash we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we will see something, if they allow us to look, that they missed, perhaps, and then we talk to your father, and see if he has heard of any rumblings of the beacon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wasn't there somewhere up north that was creepy that people were at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know when Fjord and Yasha and I were missing, you guys went somewhere that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then there's something having to do with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that was the family, the rival family.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Well, they're working with the slave trade, and Reani--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not a lead to go on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless we wanted to check in on them, because like, if I was going to smuggle a dodecahedron thing, then I might--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Smuggle is a really funny word.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Smuggle is a funny word. Yeah, it's pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we going to get through the border?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we did it the other way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we did it both ways.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did do it both ways.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right. We forged a letter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right, do you still have it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll be on your equipment list on D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may have to forge new documentation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to forge a new document, but now that we know, I'm going to do a good one here, so we're not going to be traveling as I'm doing it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does being an expositor help with that too, maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll put back on my vestiges when we get closer there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many rounds of horses have we bought this game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's lot of wild horses you've left out in the open, and three moorbounders that are wandering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We spent so much money on those moorbounders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, that's the problem when you teleport around a bunch. When you get there with animals and need to teleport back, you abandon them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We want to do five horses, six horses?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do we need a cart?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to ride a horse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can go so much faster without a cart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've ridden moorbounders, you don't want to ride a horse?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the back of one, it's uncomfortable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can ride on my shoulders while I ride the horse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, fine, I'll let this one slide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five horses at 75 gold a piece.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Each of us pay for our own horse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are riding horses, so they go pretty quickly, like as far as distance goes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit, shit! (groans) I just did something really bad!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get rid of all your gold?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (deep scary voice) I'm a new character now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I guess we've left the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We acquired. We are buying them, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've left the lady, your mom's house?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go give her a hug goodbye, I'm not just going to ghost.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has your laundry been done and folded?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns towards you and goes, "Hello love."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry we couldn't stay longer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's bad things going on in the world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But it's the good people like you and your friends "that make the bad things not everything, right?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all we can hope for, right?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's amazing that we found each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've always had a good feeling about them."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What, you got a present for me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's nothing major, but I bought you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, let me find it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got you a jar of fresh honey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, but Caduceus told me how.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's so hard for me to believe you talking to things."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All you have to do is say hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I will try that next time." "It's very good."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holds you a little longer, and then eventually lets go a bit and goes, "Oh, before you leave, "I got you a present, too."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know you've been traveling quite a bit "and you've been bouncing in some dangerous places."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It isn't much, but I hope it's helpful."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This will do some really good things, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That might just keep you more comfortable." (chuckling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will, I'll send you so many messages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I look forward to them every time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you, I miss you already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I miss you already." (laughter) She walks you off with your friends, and she gives everyone a little wave as you're gathering the horses and says, "Take care of her."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, but I mean it, take care of her."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I can get to you, imagine what "more impressive imposing figures can."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the most impressive and most imposing in the entire universe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to give my little one a hug goodbye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, Mom, are you killing more things?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the last thing we shot--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Yeza) "You don't have to answer that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is the last thing we shot? You shot me in the fucking ass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to see it? I still have a wound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Luc, go inside." (laughter) Sends him back in the Chateau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't worry, we will, he's getting very big."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't go near the water, it's a murderer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could save his life one day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or he could die learning, I mean--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like I read somewhere that 80% of swimming lessons end in death.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what blogs you've been reading.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like that's an accurate number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a big hug and kiss, and sends you off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll drop my illusion and turn into Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just to keep a difference to recent designs. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much did my mom give me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and look inside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we ride away, I'm not going to do it in front of my mom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's been saving up for a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that covers the horses and then some.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything else in Nicodranas you want to do before you leave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did your forging? You forged?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First off, you're going to try and forge some documentation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I was trying to do it before we got on the road so that it wouldn't be all like ew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is the context of the documentation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, uh-- It's letter from, give me a name of the Cobalt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Giving permission for research for the crew in behalf of the Cobalt Reserve, Cobalt Soul.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Research the impacts of the lunar cycles on the waves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we just leave it with the first name you said and that's enough?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but it was going to be, yeah, I guess the guards won't know that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll write all that shit out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. On your third draft.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make, I'll say with this, make a dexterity check with your proficiency modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it? A dexterity or performance check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is for, yeah, proficiency bonus and your dexterity bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I rolled all the things beforehand and that's not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel like you've done a fair enough job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's already put this in the jail for the night and then this is going to get filled up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything you wish to do during the journey?

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: You know what I'm talking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need to know which direction--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the one that is the focus of your craft.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And some of your goals there, or there is the alternative one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are talks of some mages that have attempted to push the flow of time to the reverse, and those who have attempted it were never seen again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: places, or where those things were done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a brief stint in history, the Prime Deities and the Betrayer Gods did call a truce, because some of these powerful nations began to hunt the gods that supposedly created them, and that led to a swift demise to most of these societies, and that's where the ruined nation, that-- where Zemnian and that whole element comes from, was destroyed. But one of those mages, one of the top, top, top archmages of that society was supposedly researching this specific thing, and had pulled all of his resources and had gathered this large ritual in which he was hoping to go back and find a way to change the fortune of this conflict, and inform himself of the coming strategy of the combined deities, and try and basically give them the edge to win that war, and was never seen again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you learn other teleportation circles here? Do they have them listed or something? Can you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it like calling a phone number?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if it's the Yellow Pages for locational circles.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At least the other Cobalt Soul-y places?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here, yeah, here, maybe they have one here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything or anyone else you want to research?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just need to talk to Zeenoth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, no worries, up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need access to the teleportation circle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ruins of Draconia, Dreemoth Ravine, Lotusden Greenwood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and also if you have any-- do we keep a record of other teleportation circles? Can you learn of the sigils of other circles here, or do you have to physically be there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We generally do not, for the worry that it can be abused."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why do you re-- where are you planning to go?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have run-ins with them in the past, and information, and we think we're fairly equipped to track them down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who are these people, if I might ask you? "I don't even know the names of our attackers."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The one who seems to be the leader of this particular band is named Obann.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He seems to be obsessed with raising these entities from the times of the Calamity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to go ahead and try and research that himself, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We killed him, and he's not dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's raising or seems to be infatuated with these demons, he ended up raising this monster called the Laughing Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do any of you speak Abyssal? Or know Abyssal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's actually going-- you're looking over his shoulder and he begins to pore through, and it looks like he can read it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It speaks of a servant of Graz'zt, "the Dark Prince of the Argent Palace, "within the Abyssal domain of Azzatar."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. But he's not destroyed, he's back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll amend it." He takes out and puts another note in to amend the note.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then, yeah, anything about the Laughing Hand? Man, there's a lot of demons and shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somebody like to help him research this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you helming it, or is he helming it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll give him advantage on helming it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll for-- yeah, you roll for Guidance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So is this the one, the one that did this?" and he points to his stomach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you find him, will you do me the honor of-- "what's the phrase the kids say, fucking it up?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I would be-- I would be happy to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: C-can I ask who all-- who all perished from the attacks? Anyone that I know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leads you through all the different names, and two of them were students you trained with, and then others were people that you maybe had passing knowledge of, but nobody that's specifically--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Madeer? That was the other one that trained me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Madeer was not on that list.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a teleportation circle here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, teleportation circle, can we learn it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check, with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just this once, because you're going after these things."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not supposed to offer it out to people "who aren't of the Archive, but-- follow me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you know, I'm an expositor now, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to ask, can you take a horse through a teleportation circle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we take a horse through it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we don't push the horses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We ride the horses through the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to bring the horses into the Cobalt Soul?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see Zeenoth going like, "Uh--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, wild hair, while the horses are being fetched, can I approach Zeenoth quietly and say, Do you have any writings on the Traveler? A being known as the Traveler?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I believe so, yes." He goes and takes the familiar book of recent cults, the one where the Angel of Irons was annotated, and there is another subsection there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hands it to you and says, "There's a small amount."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At first, we thought it was a mass hallucination, "but apparently there's enough over distances "that there's some thread to it, but I worry."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you have heard of this individual?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The information is there on the page."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any account in the brief amount here of witnessing displays of the power of the Traveler?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, all of them are second-hand accounts from people that appear to be proselytizing his power and joy and capability.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we can't just bamf there, we have to bamf to somewhere else with a teleportation circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what's the closest circle we know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wanted to know what these runes are on the map, do we have those?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The closest one we know is Xhorhas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You wrote that down, right? What the runes mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the runes mean? I don't know if I wrote them down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that very close to where we're going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The ruins of Draconia are over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I've never heard of that place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, Draconia's been gone for two decades."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry, we have no specific dealings with the Dynasty, "especially in these times."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you can just take us back to Xhorhas whenever you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We say quietly, we say very quietly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we still want to see this one, so we can get back to it, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make sure it'll fit our horses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There he goes into a circular chamber that goes into multiple rooms, and each of these doors, you can see marked as to the locations of these various archives of the Cobalt Soul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is where all the other teleportation circles that probably are part of this network all come back to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which by the way, as you guys came through the library on horseback-- (clopping) (laughter) in this giant marble hall, the open space, the echoing sound of multiple horses coming through, every single person there stopped what they were doing and just watched as you slowly--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's hope those horses didn't shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't say they couldn't poop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course we want to do stuff here, but if we go to Rexxentrum real quick, you could learn the sigil there, and then we could always get there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then we could come right back here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Might be a quick round trip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're right back with horses. (laughing) Actually, only a couple of us need to go-- well, whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I think we should all go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These horses need to see Rexxentrum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could get in serious trouble for this, so quickly."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's permanent, you guys can step in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a door that is closed that leads outside this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything on the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the floor in here? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, the teleportation circle will be in another room, the one that leads--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's akin to the one that you first got to, so there is a symbol on the ground, and there are other doors that lead to the other ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we do, oh-- so that's the one you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you open up all the doors, do you get to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're all here, it's the same location.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a door open from above and footsteps coming down the stairs now. (thumping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get out, get out, let's go back, let's go back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just hear footsteps, multiple-- because suddenly a bunch of clomping horses arrived and began marching around echoing through in a subterranean chamber that is under watch and key.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes him like 10 minutes, though, right? Takes you a minute?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's still here in this room. Is this the exit back to where we came from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are other doors that are marked to Zadash, Port Damali, you know, Vasselheim.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, go through Port Damali, we can get that one, too! (laughter) (all talking at once)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb rides towards the Port Damali one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door isn't open! Who's going to open the door?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I open it, I open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the top of your horse? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll get down and pick the lock!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pick the lock, go, go, go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have some, I have some, here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you can see two figures rushing down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --wearing familiar robes of the Cobalt Soul, along with two Righteous Brand soldiers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello, who's there? "You, stop, stop, who's there?!" What are you doing, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you picking the lock? What are you doing? What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the door made of? What's the door made of? The Port Damali door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of the doors appear to be made of some sort of a light-stained gray wood maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to tap Beau on the back and enhance her ability for charisma checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you begin casting a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as you begin to make the incantation, both of the soldiers go, "She's a caster!" and they immediately take out two crossbows and fire at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Wait, stop, stop, hold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in Cobalt Reserve clothes, come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just broke into their house--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just broke in to the subterranean area on horseback while trying to break through--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would've had to murder our way through the other location.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it is really on guard right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, one crossbow bolt catches you for six points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like right in the lower abdomen, right where the floating rib is, sticks in, and the two other monks are like, whoa whoa whoa, wait, wait, hold on, hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Excuse me, what is going on here?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two guards (clicking) reload the crossbows, and just waiting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know how communication gets lost, but it was a quick turnaround in terms of notification on letting you all know that we were coming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was trying to purposefully lie so I could--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say either you can roll persuasion or deception with disadvantage, your choice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have, hang on, because you gave me--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if I got my full spell out though, before they shot me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a concentration check, actually, so roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, you heard about the attacks, right? That just happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are on extremely high alert, "and if you are who you say you are, "you should know not to just appear in here."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four Righteous Brand soldiers come in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With no word in advance and with the heightened security "we're having to maintain because of these said events, "I'm going to have to ask you to wait here "and go through processing and approval "from the high archivist."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're in a really big hurry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then you shouldn't have just appeared here with six horses "in the middle of dangerous a time period for our people." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get that, and I understand the sentiment, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, I know every expositor on the list here, "and I have not heard of an Expositor Beauregard."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, word didn't get to us, did it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Apparently a lot of things don't get to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are able to communicate with Zadash, correct?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is awkward, but we do have the best of intentions, as hard as that is to believe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will need each of your names, please, "starting with you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello, my name is Caleb Widogast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long is this going to take?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're trigger happy! Don't cast any spells. I'm just going to sit here and suffer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will work all this out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you have the six Righteous Brand soldiers here trained on you, just looking over you all like carefully, looking over your faces to remember them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to ask the horses to stare back at them, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stare at the one that shot me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to start crying, just a single tear down my cheek, with the saddest expression I can muster.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He hasn't really seen my charm yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four more soldiers come down and join them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we sitting on horseback this whole time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This room is filling up with poop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually the half-orc returns, and, "Word has returned from the Archive of Zadash."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just burned Zeenoth so bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have been given temporary rights of passage, "but you are also, until further notice, "banned from the Rexxentrum Archive."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't even mean to come here--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We came to the wrong thing anyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Understood, does that include the teleportation?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go to the Port Damali circle with haste, shall we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're just going to go back to where we meant to go in the first place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The half-orc shuffles over and pulls out a ring of keys and unlocks the door to Port Damali and opens it and steps back and just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was your name again, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're asking the half-orc, which one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look through my notes here, because--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't think we were going to do Rexxentrum

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Just jump around the goddamn globe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just gives you the nod of please get the fuck out of my place, the look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, can you send message to Port Damali that we're coming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, let's just go, let's just go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go, and the horses (whooshing), now disappearing into the Port Damali circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strange when one of the horses, actually it would be probably yours, Nott, relieving itself as you're passing through the portal, loose horse road apples, through the process of teleportation, get kind of-- you remember when physics fucks up in Skyrim and things get weird and crazy? Just like, scatters a bit upon approval.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other doors to Zadash, Rexxentrum, and Tal'Dorei.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone break in. We'll try these doors.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is the door going to Zadash made of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These also appear to be made of wood, but the wood is of a different type.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to pick the lock or should I just kick it open with the horse?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't pick it with a broken tool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll ride over to the door, back the horse up, and I'm going to smack it on the ass and try and get it to kick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The loud echo manages to reverberate through the chamber, and you immediately hear (creaking).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Several footsteps now rushing down the staircase.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we just Home Alone on this door and get the fuck outta here please? (all talking at once)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see the Port Damali sigil beneath you, so you have that now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's busting on the Tal'Dorei door right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's just trying to get back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're trying to go back to Zadash.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're banging on the Zadash door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it unlocked? Can I just try to-- can I see if it's unlocked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush up to try and open the door? All right, it is locked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we start unloading on it now, please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, do you want a bomb, I have a bomb?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, we'll just ask if we can go back--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's just walk out into Port Damali and find a place where I can draw on the ground!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Excuse me!" (laughter) At which point down at the bottom of the staircase you see, in familiar Cobalt Soul robes, a man in probably his early 60s or so, graying hair that's, you know, combed over and slicked to one side to cover a major bald spot, a heavier mustache that curls down to the bottom of the chin, liver spots on his forehead, and two armed zhelezo behind him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a long story. We were just hoping to leave. This is a long story.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the Zhelezo is like sitting there holding a heavy crossbow at the side, pulls out a small horn and goes like-- (imitates horn blowing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody do something really nice before I just fucking--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, yeah, I'm going to Enhance Ability on Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you begin to cast the spell--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I immediately start shouting, while they shoot, this is a misunderstanding, please, please!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a time loop. We're caught in a time loop!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're just collecting crossbow bolts across Exandria!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of them immediately drop their heavy crossbow for a second and pull out their sword and point it to you and they're like, "Not another move!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just want to get out of your hair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The older fellow in the middle goes like, looks you both over. Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't you remember from last time? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he sits there looking you over, and looking over the rest of you, very discerning, the other guards come down, immediately get their heavy crossbows up, the Zhelezo now, there's five of them in the chamber around the one there, he goes, "I apologize, but there has been "some very terrible things happened within the Cobalt Soul."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you would be patient, we have to go check in "to confirm your story."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will all wait here patiently and quietly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wait about another 15 or so minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "However, it has been requested that you are also "banned from the Archive in Port Damali "until further notice."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Also, I have a message to Beauregard "from Archivist Zeenoth."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He says 'Please, for the love of Ioun, stop.'" (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb, in his mind, is just envisioning massive libraries decay and melt into the sea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Passing through on the other side of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wipes once more, looks up and goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go track down these people, and then check in with you later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets up, holds his side, unlocks and opens the door to whichever you want to go, or are you just casting something here. What do you need?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, we actually have decided just to hang here until-- (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sometimes you have to go on long journey to find out what you really loved was back home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's mostly my fault, so please don't be too hard on Beauregard, mostly my fault.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, I know I'm a pain in the ass, but I swear, I got good intentions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got banned from every Cobalt Soul library--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to be so happy with us once we take care of the people that hurt them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They just don't know it yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we trying to get to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And this is hard to say that, because I want to talk to him, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can get a thousand miles away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I should send at least a message to the Bright Queen and let them know that they're over there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We tried to tell her about this shit, though, and she seemed--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I don't know, maybe she doesn't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you were to contact Essek and tell him what's going on and where we need to go, maybe he would be willing to give us one more spin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Watch out, there's a cart coming by.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, I've been trying not to bug the man, but I cannot think of a way to get there faster.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I mean, we've been gone for like, two to three weeks now, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He probably misses us, if we're going to be honest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can trade, you know, obviously the information we've gathered in exchange for another helping hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just evidence of our Cobalt cooperation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to duck into an alleyway so I can send a message to Essek.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go find my contact lens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, I hate rolling tonight! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to blame you if this is bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He seemed like he would do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, one step at a time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wonder what he needs our help with.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll thread that needle when we get to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Watch out, there's a cart coming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it possible they might have a way for us to get back into town when we need to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, we can just bamf into the Cobalt Reserve if we need to come back here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To Zadash, without horses it would be better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll let them cool off a little bit, I think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, there were other portals and teleportation circles that we've seen ruins of that we've destroyed in the past, I'm sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like the Gentleman has one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we're about to see Essek, he's probably going to ask how goes the search for the thing that we're supposed to be searching for, you know, the dodeca? We have not done anything towards that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can tell him we're really looking, but in the meantime, this popped up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He also said there was no urgency for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I could do it right here, if we want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, I'll keep an eye out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're blocking the line of sight into the alley, is that what you're doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you-- Stupid. (laughs) Is there like a barn we can hide in or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we could find a place, it doesn't have to be right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's being posted at the three corners?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'll be at the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I would like the three of you to roll an intimidation check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few people give you some terse looks, they seem untrusting of you. They don't go for the alley, but you've definitely caught some attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crownsguard begin to take notice of this tinier, goblinoid-type creature that seems to be a bit shifty and not quite, you know-- seems to be very plainly placed to try and keep anybody from entering the alley, illegal activity being a problem in this city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But doesn't she look like Veth this whole time? You were Veth for eight hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're still within eight hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true, that's true, yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 40 or 50 feet from you, and you can see three Crownsguard and two Righteous Brand from two different corners begin to like, make eye contact with each other and begin walking towards you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all right by where Caleb is in the inside of the alley with the horses at the ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could go invisible, but I feel like they would see that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just look like you're going to barf or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They just see me being shifty and they start walking over?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just start crying, fake crying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a performance or deception check, your choice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them steps forward and goes, "Are you okay?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cute, has a little collar with a button on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you just pick a name? Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where should we bring the dog to if we find it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't remember where I'm staying! To Pumat Sol's! He's my friend, the Invulnerable Vagrant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: they don't buy all of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They may go check in with Pumat Sol.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they gone? Out of eyesight, or are they still--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're still watching you cry there, like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wait till she's like 10 feet away and I go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you all jump back on your horses, and they all rush over to the alleyway--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last thing you hear is, "What ze--?" That's it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter) We are like, they sent out the choppers, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are so hidden, those stars are going to go away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys arrive within the subterranean basement of the Lucid Bastion in the Dynasty city of Rosohna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll go ahead and pick this up next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was such a bad spiral. (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) I mean, you got what you wanted, but at what cost?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Banned from our library, as are your children and your children's children, for three months.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give me back your library card!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a Xerox photo of your driver's license.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next they're going to go, oh, don't Beauregard that or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys for watching the chaos.
